name: Maze Inc.
description:
Can you get in and get out? Maze Inc. is a unique thriller adventure inside the deadly hallways of evil corporation.

Something is happening here... Now you must go around the world visiting all the locations of corporation evil and get to its heart by finding your way maze after maze, labyrinth after labyrinth. Deadly traps will be waiting around the corner, so watch your step and don't let this thriller get to you.

Innovative gameplay will excite you but Maze Inc. will get you.

Special sale price to celebrate our new African office!
